remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelMode> enumeration is used to represent the type of operation that the user was performing when the **Cancel** button was clicked in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> item. (A Cancel button is a button whose `CommandName` property set to "Cancel".)
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCancelMode> enumeration to check which operation is being canceled in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> item.
